component.name: ODGŁOS
component.summary: Interdimentional journey of a small owl and her friends, in search of Polish Radio Experimental Studio

description.p: Come along on a journey with a small owl looking for her lost friends in other dimensions. Followed by a shapeshifting snake, she has to get to the Polish Radio Experimental Studio that holds control over the universe.

The game design process emerges from experimental ways of creating music developed by PRES, where all the sounds used in the game were sourced from via compositions by Krzysztof Knittel, Elżbieta Sikora and Ryszard Szeremeta.
